tuv.seg: Introduction to income tax credits and reliefs
Réamhrá ar chreidmheasanna cánach agus faoiseamh ó cháin ioncaim
Tax reliefs reduce the amount of tax that you have to pay
Laghdaíonn faoiseamh cánach an méid cánach a bhíonn ort a íoc
The tax reliefs to which you are entitled depend on your personal circumstances
Braitheann an faoiseamh cánach atá tú i dteideal ar do chúinsí pearsanta
Tax is calculated as a percentage of your income
Ríomhtar cáin mar chéatadán den ioncam atá agat
Your tax credits are deducted from this to give the amount of tax that you have to pay
Asbhainfear do chreidmheasanna cánach ón méid seo leis an méid cánach a bhíonn ort a íoc a thabhairt duit
A tax credit has the effect of reducing your tax by the amount of the credit
Is é an tionchar a bhíonn ag creidmheas cánach ná do cháin iníoctha a laghdú de mhéid an chreidmheasa

Everyone is entitled to a personal tax credit. There are personal tax credits for single people, people who are married or in a civil partnership and people who are widowed or are surviving civil partners
Tá gach duine i dteideal creidmheas pearsanta cánach bídís singil, pósta, nó i bpairtnéireacht shibhialta nó daoine atá ina mbaintreach nó ina bpáirtnéirí sibhialta marthanacha
If you are in employment, getting a pension or getting a taxable social welfare payment (such as Jobseeker’s Benefit) you are also entitled to the PAYE tax credit of €1,650
Má tá tú fostaithe, ag fáil pinsin nó ag fáil íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh inchánach (cosúil le Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist) tú i dteideal creidmheas cánach ÍMAT de € 1,650 chomh maith
So, for example, if you are single and in employment you are entitled to an annual tax credit of €1,650 and the PAYE tax credit of €1,650
Mar shampla, má tá tú singil agus i bhfostaíocht tá tú i dteideal creidmheas cánach bliantúil de €1,650 agus an creidmheas cánach ÍMAT de € 1,650
This means that when the total amount of tax you owe is calculated €3,300 will be deducted from this
Ciallaíonn sé sin nuair a bhíonn an méid iomlán cánach atá le híoc agat ríofa go ndéanfar €3300 a asbhaint as sin
In effect, this means that if you earn €16,500 or less you do not pay any income tax (because your tax credits of €3,300 are more than or equal to the amount of tax you are due to pay)

Go bunúsach, ciallaíonn sé sin má thuilleann tú €16,500 nó níos lú níl gá duit aon cháin ioncaim a íoc (mar go bhfuil do chreidmheasanna cánach de €3,300 níos mó ná nó cothrom leis an méid cánach atá dlite duit a íoc)
However you may be liable to pay Universal Social Charge (if your income is over €13,000 and PRSI (depending on how much you earn each week)
Ach d'fhéadfá a bheith faoi dhliteanas an Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch a íoc (má tá d'ioncam os cionn € 12,012 agus ÁSPC (ag brath ar cé mhéid a thuilleann tú gach seachtain)
If you are married or in a civil partnership, you have the option of sharing tax credits and tax bands between you and your spouse or civil partner
Má tá tú pósta nó i bpáirtnéireacht shibhialta, tá rogha agat creidmheasanna cánach agus bandaí cánach a roinnt idir tú féin agus do chéile nó do pháirtnéir sibhialta
If one spouse or civil partner works in the home caring for one or more dependent people you may be able to claim a Home Carer Tax credit
Má oibríonn céile nó páirtnéir sibhialta amháin sa bhaile ag tabhairt aire do dhuine cleithiúnach amháin nó níos mó d'fhéadfá a bheith in ann creidmheas Cánach do Chúramóir Baile a éileamh
You can read more about taxation of married people and civil partners
Is féidir leat níos mó faoi chánachas dhaoine pósta agus pháirtnéirí sibhialta a léamh
In some cases you can get a tax refund for specific expenses, for example, medical expenses or mortgage interest
Sna cásanna seo, tá an an aisíocíocaíocht bunaithe ar an méid a íocann tú amach
The value of a tax allowance will depend on whether it is allowed at the highest rate of income tax that you pay or is restricted to the standard 20% rate
I gcásanna áirithe, cosúil le hús ar mhorgáiste, tá teorainn leis an uasmhéid is féidir leat a éileamh
Take the example of a claim of €100
Tóg éileamh €100 mar shampla
If you pay tax at 40% and you can claim it at this rate, then it will reduce your tax by €40 (€100 x 40%)
Má íocann tú cáin ag 40% agus gur féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh ag an ráta seo, laghdófar do cháin de €40 dá réir (€100 x 40%)
If the highest rate of tax that you pay is 20%, or the relief is restricted to the standard rate, then the claim of €100 will reduce your tax by €20 (€100 x 20%)
Má tá an ráta ard cánach a íocann tú 20%, nó an faoiseamh srianta don ráta caighdeánach, laghdóidh an t-éileamh €100 do cháin de €20 (€100 x 20%)
More information about how tax credits and allowances work is available in our document about how your income tax is calculated
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoin mbealach a oibríonn liúntais chánach, léigh faoi cháin ioncaim sa nasc thuas
Tax credits and allowances for specific circumstances and groups
Creidmheasanna cánach agus liúntais le haghaidh imthosca agus grúpaí sonracha
If you are caring for a dependent child on your own you can claim the Single Person Child Carer Credit in addition to your personal tax credit
Má tá tú ag tabhairt aire do leanbh cleithiúnach leat féin is féidir leat an Creidmheas Cánach Cúramóra Linbh do Dhuine Singil a éileamh sa bhreis ar do chreidmheas cánach pearsanta
There is also an increase in your standard rate tax band
Tá méadú chomh maith ar bhanda cánach do ráta chaighdeánaigh
This means that you can earn more before you start to pay the higher rate of tax
Ciallaíonn sé seo gur féidir leat níos mó a thuilleann sula dtosaíonn tú a íoc ar an ráta cánach níos airde
If you are aged 65 or over, you are liable to pay income tax in the normal way
Má tá tú ag 65 bliain d'aois nó os a chionn, tá tú faoi dhliteanas cáin ioncaim a íoc ar an ngnáthbhealach
However, there are tax exemption limits for people aged 65 or over and there are some extra tax credits
Mar sin féin, tá teorainneacha díolúine cánach do dhaoine in aois 65 nó os a chionn agus tá roinnt creidmheasanna cánach breise
It is possible to get tax relief for covenants to people aged 65 and over
Is féidir faoiseamh cánach a fháil le haghaidh cúnant do dhaoine in aois 65 nó os a chionn
In certain circumstances, you may be able to reclaim any DIRT (Deposit Interest Retention Tax) paid
I gcúinsí áirithe, d'fhéadfá a bheith in ann aon DIRT (Cáin Choinneála ar Ús Taisce) a íocadh a athéileamh
Find out more about tax reliefs for older people
Faigh amach tuilleadh faoi fhaoiseamh cánach do dhaoine scothaosta
Contributions to a pension are eligible for tax relief at your highest rate of tax
Tá ranníocaíochtaí pinsin incháilithe le haghaidh faoiseamh cánach ag an ráta cánach is airde
Find out more about employment-related tax reliefs, including reliefs for workers at sea and workers who commute to work in a different country
Faigh amach tuilleadh faoi fhaoiseamh cánach a bhaineann le fostaíocht, lena n-áirítear faoiseamh d'oibrithe ar farraige agus oibrithe a bhíonn ag taisteal a bheith ag obair i dtír eile
You can also read about taxation of benefits from employment
Is féidir leat léamh chomh maith faoi cháin ar shochair ón bhfostaíocht
If you rent a room in your home to a private tenant you may claim rent a room relief
Má tá do theach ar cíos, d'fhéadfá Creidmheas Cánach Cíosa a éileamh
If you rent your home you may be able to claim Rent Tax Credit if you meet the criteria
Má íocann tú morgáiste, d'fhéadfá faoiseamh cánach ar ús morgáiste a éileamh
If you pay a mortgage, you may claim tax relief on mortgage interest
Má tá seomra ar cíos agat i do theach le tionónta príobháideach, d'fhéadfá faoiseamh seomra ar cíos a éileamh
For an overview of tax reliefs relating to housing, and for information on taxation when transferring the ownership of a home, see housing tax credits and reliefs

Chun léargas ginearálta a fháil ar fhaoiseamh cánach maidir le tithíocht, agus chun eolas a fháil ar chánachas nuair ata úinéireacht tí á aistriú, féach ar creidmheasanna agus faoiseamh cánach tithíochta
Tax relief is available on fees paid for approved third-level courses
Tá faoiseamh cánach ar fáil ar tháillí íoctha maidir le cúrsaí tríú leibhéal faofa
You can find out more about tax relief for third-level fees here
Is féidir leat tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoi fhaoiseamh cánach do tháillí tríú leibhéal anseo
If you pay medical expenses that are not covered by the State or by private health insurance, you may claim tax relief on some of those expenses
Má tá tú ag íoc costais leighis nach bhfuil clúdaithe ag an Stát nó ag árachas sláinte príobháideadh, féadfaidh tú faoiseamh cánach a éileamh ar na costais sin
Find out more about taxation and medical expenses and about tax relief on nursing home fees and for dependent relatives
Faigh amach tuilleadh faoi cháin agus costais leighis agus faoi fhaoiseamh cánach ar tháillí tithe altranais agus ar son gaolta cleithiúnacha
Tax relief is also available for premiums paid for health insurance and for long-term care insurance
Tá faoiseamh cánach ar fáil i leith préimheanna a íoctar maidir le hárachas shláinte agus árachas don chúram fadtéarmach
The insurance company grants this tax relief at source
Deonaíonn an comhlacht árachais an faoiseamh cánach seo ag an bhfoinse
Tax following a death
Faoiseamh ó cháin ioncaim tar éis bháis
The treatment of tax reliefs following a death depends on the civil status of the deceased person and on the way in which he or she was taxed if married or in a civil partnership

Braitheann cóireáil faoiseamh cánach i ndiaidh bás duine ar stádas sibhialta an duine atá básaithe agus ar an mbealach inar gearradh cáin air nó uirthi má tá sé nó sí pósta nó i bpáirtnéireacht shibhialta
Additional tax credits are available to widowed persons and surviving civil partners
Tá creidmheasanna cánach breise ar fáil do bhaintreacha
Find out more about tax reliefs following a death
Faigh tuilleadh eolais faoi faoiseamh cánach tar éis bháis
Separation, divorce or dissolution
Idirscaradh, colscaradh agus díscaoileadh
If a married couple divorce or separate, or civil partners separate or a civil partnership is dissolved, this has important tax implications
Má scarann lánúin phósta nó má fhaigheann siad colscaradh, nó má scarann páirtithe sibhialta nó má díscaoiltear páirtnéireacht shibhialta, tá impleachtaí tábhachtacha cánach i gceist
Find out more about taxation following separation, divorce or dissolution, including information about how maintenance payments are taxed
Faigh amach tuilleadh faoi cháin in ndiaidh scartha, colscartha nó díscaoilte, lena n-áirítear eolas faoi mbealach a ndéantar cáin a ghearradh ar íocaíochtaí cothabhála
This table sets out the main tax credits available in 2016 and 2017
Féach thíos na priomh-chreidmhis chánach ar fáil i 2016 agus 2017
The Revenue Commissioners also provide a list of tax credits and the value of the credits in current and previous years
Soláthraíonn na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim liosta na gcreidmheasanna cánach atá ar fáil agus luach na gcreidmheasanna sna blianta reatha agus roimhe seo
